nodes.text: Mirran Six was a location home to the vollka, a species of large cat. Though the creatures were not often known to leave Mirran Six, one vollka, named Remy, was owned by the San Tekka clan for over a century. Upon sighting Remy, at that point owned by Jordanna Sparkburn on the planet Tiikae, the Jedi Padawan Imri Cantaros was surprised to see a vollka away from Mirran Six, having previously read about the creatures.
Mirran Six was mentioned in the 2021 novel The High Republic: Out of the Shadows, written by Justina Ireland.
